select t1.DEPART_CODE,t1.DEPART_NAME as label,t1.DEPARTID,t2.DEPARTID as PID ,t1.DEPARTID as value from ad_depart_v t1 left join ad_depart_v t2 on t1.PARENTCODE = t2.DEPART_CODE where t1.status='N' and t1.DEPART_NAME is not null and t1.depart_code is not null
AND t1.DEPART_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{departMentName}),'%')
